name: Magical technique Generator
explanation: Magical techniques for magic tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.

tables.name: magical technique
tables.explanation: Subtables present energies known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Modern and scifi subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with the default fantasy setting. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary magical techniques once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: fantasy
tables.explanation: Imaginary magical techniques for fantasy worlds.

tables.name: scifi
tables.explanation: Imaginary magics for science fiction worlds.
